ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_id | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> ( ( F |` ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) ` k ) = ( F ` k ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( ( F |` ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) ` k ) = ( F ` k ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_seqfeq | |- ( M e. ZZ -> seq M ( .+ , ( F |` ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) ) = seq M ( .+ , F ) ) |
